name: Restaurant Management Frontend
description: A dynamic front-end application built using Flutter (Dart) to streamline restaurant operations through an intuitive user interface and responsive client-side logic.
largeDescription:
This Flutter-based web application serves as the front-end of a restaurant management system, delivering seamless interaction and real-time responsiveness. It is designed to handle essential restaurant operations such as:

- 🍽️ Order Processing: Streamlines order placement and tracking for efficient service.
- 📋 Menu Management: Empowers staff to dynamically update menu items and categories.
- 💬 Customer Interaction: Provides user-centric interfaces to enhance the dining experience.

With a responsive layout and clean component architecture, the project emphasizes performance, user experience, and integration readiness with backend systems. It showcases your ability to design scalable Flutter applications tailored to real-world operational needs.

name: Restaurant Management Backend
description: A robust Java-based backend service powering restaurant operations through secure RESTful APIs and modular business logic.
largeDescription:
This repository houses the backend infrastructure for a restaurant management system, fully developed in Java. It delivers a suite of RESTful APIs and implements core functionalities essential for smooth restaurant workflows, including:

- 🔄 Order Lifecycle Management: Handles order creation, updates, and tracking.
- 🗂️ Menu & Inventory APIs: Facilitates real-time updates to menu items and stock levels.
- 🔐 Authentication & Security: Enforces secure access and data protection across services.

The backend seamlessly integrates with the Flutter-based frontend and is engineered for scalability, efficient data handling, and maintainability. This project highlights your strengths in backend architecture, API design, and production-level implementation.

name: SwiftCafe
description: A Flutter-based mobile app for placing orders at SwiftCafe, designed to streamline the ordering experience with a clean and intuitive interface.
largeDescription:
SwiftCafe is a cross-platform mobile app built using Flutter, crafted to enhance the café-ordering experience. With intuitive navigation across authentication, home, and product detail screens, the app allows customers to:

- ☕ Explore the menu and product details.
- ✏️ Customize their orders effortlessly.
- 📱 Place orders with a smooth, responsive UI.

The project emphasizes simplicity, performance, and modern design, making it ideal for real-world customer-centric ordering solutions.

name: GreenHive
description: An intelligent greenhouse automation system powered by Dart, featuring real-time control, monitoring, and data visualization for optimized plant care.
largeDescription:
GreenHive is a smart greenhouse system designed to intelligently manage and automate key agricultural functions. Developed primarily in Dart (97.5%), with additional support from TypeScript (1.6%) and other technologies (0.9%), this project aims to:

- 🌱 Automate climate control and irrigation through sensor integration.
- 📈 Provide real-time monitoring of environmental data like humidity, temperature, and soil moisture.
- 🧠 Enable intelligent decision-making with predictive logic for optimized plant growth.

With a focus on sustainability and agricultural innovation, GreenHive offers a mobile-friendly dashboard that empowers users to control greenhouse conditions remotely, making it ideal for modern smart farming ecosystems.
